name: Andromeda Survivors
description:
Defeat thousands of enemies that are invading Andromeda! Andromeda Survivors is a casual game with rogue-lite elements where you collect skills and upgrades for your ship to create amazing builds!



▪ㅤWhen an enemy is killed, it drops experience which is used to get skills for your ship thus becoming the most powerful in Andromeda!



▪ㅤProve yourself worthy of new skills and ships by completing the available missions!



▪ㅤBecome even stronger by making upgrades to your ship and skills!
